item.title: Why and How To Use Docker for Development
item.description: Why and How To Use Docker for Development [ read more ] Docker is not just for deployment, it’s great for development too 5 min read Deep Reinforcement Learning with TensorFlow 2.0 [ read more ] In this tutorial I will showcase the upcoming TensorFlow 2.0 features through the lense of deep reinforcement… 10 min read FastText sentiment analysis for tweets: A straightforward guide.
